title: Chromas for IP
body: Chromas for IP was limited time? ana can ill buy anothers chromas for IP?

replies.body:
According to our [Chomas 1.1 FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/chromas#faq), Chroma IP sales happen twice a year. I don't have any information on when the next sale will happen, but keep your eyes peeled for the announcement on the [News Page.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/)

Let me know if you have any questions.
